metadata.title: CVE-2022-3201 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in DevTools in Google Chrome onChrome OS prior to 105.0.5195.125 allowed an attacker who convinced a userto install a malicious extension to bypass navigation restrictions via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
